snippet.title: Cold Zero: The Last Stand - Episode 2 - The Camper
snippet.description:
Some nasty situations here. That sniper will oneshot you unless all the lights are off. Jane will warn you about that, but I forgot to show it.
And that camper in the sewer? What the hell? Is the mission named after him?
Srsly - stealth in this game is mostly an additional challenge. I mean, one of the enemies died from friendly fire in this video; I only used the baseball bat. If anyone is capable of finishing it without getting noticed, I'd really like to see that, or at least know how it's done.
